metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Docks roadOne of Flaming Fists - NOTE Please rename to Fist Gneiss.

0.speaker: Fist Gneiss
0.text: We should probably look into what happened to the foundry, but maybe we'll just wait until the flames die down.

1.speaker: Fist Gneiss
1.text: Pantella's in a mood. Don't get in that Fist's way when she's in a mood.
